block.p: LEAD: President Reagan and his wife, Nancy, will travel to New York on Saturday to attend the funeral of William J. Casey, the White House announced Thursday. Mr. Casey, the former Director of Central Intelligence, who was a close friend of the President, died Wednesday at at Glen Cove Community Hospital on Long Island.

LEAD: President Reagan and his wife, Nancy, will travel to New York on Saturday to attend the funeral of William J. Casey, the White House announced Thursday. Mr. Casey, the former Director of Central Intelligence, who was a close friend of the President, died Wednesday at at Glen Cove Community Hospital on Long Island.

President Reagan and his wife, Nancy, will travel to New York on Saturday to attend the funeral of William J. Casey, the White House announced Thursday. Mr. Casey, the former Director of Central Intelligence, who was a close friend of the President, died Wednesday at at Glen Cove Community Hospital on Long Island. The funeral will be at Roslyn Harbor.
